email_template.name: community_product_approved
email_template.subject: Community Product Approved for data.gov.my
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Your submission of the community product **{{product_name}}** has been
approved for showcasing on <https://data.gov.my>.

You may search for your entry on the [Community Products page](https://data.gov.my/community-products).

Thank you for contributing to our community showcase.

Warm regards,  
data.gov.my data team

email_template.subject: Lulusan Produk Komuniti untuk data.gov.my
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Permohonan anda untuk produk komuniti **{{product_name}}** telah diluluskan
untuk dipaparkan di <https://data.gov.my>.

Anda boleh mencari entri anda di [halaman Produk Komuniti](https://data.gov.my/community-products).

Terima kasih kerana menyumbang kepada pameran komuniti kami.

Sekian, Terima Kasih.  
Pasukan data data.gov.my
